entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
